title: Velâ€™Koz and Tahm Kench join the 1000 day club..
body:
As of December 26, Vel’Koz and Tahm Kench have gone 1000 days without a new skin, their last ones being April Fools 2016. Oh what fun, my tentacle boi has never got a skin since I started playing!

Next up is Sion in a few weeks(last skin is Mecha Zero)!
